meanings.definition: The quality or state of being a wife.
meanings.sent1: Her wifeliness shone through as she cared for her family.
meanings.sent2: The wifeliness of the woman was evident in her nurturing nature.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly remarked on her wifeliness when she expertly packed his lunch.
meanings.sent4: The wifeliness of the queen was admired by all in the kingdom.
meanings.sent5: The wifeliness of the old photo captured the essence of a bygone era.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or qualities traditionally associated with being a wife.
meanings.sent1: She embodied wifeliness with her loving gestures towards her husband.
meanings.sent2: In many cultures, cooking and cleaning are seen as part of wifeliness.
meanings.sent3: Her sense of humor added a unique twist to her wifeliness.
meanings.sent4: The wifeliness of the house was felt in every corner, cozy and welcoming.
meanings.sent5: The wifeliness of the garden reflected her dedication to creating a peaceful home.
